name: GameKid
summary: The Notebook city princess has been kidnapped by the evil Scribble King and it's up to Androkid to save her with the help of the magical fairy. Watch out for Scribble Kings guards because they will make you sad if they catch you. Use confetti bombs to help you on your adventure. Collect all the gold coins to open up the magical door to proceed to the next level. 20 levels in all with some surprises along the way...
